Begin_BVM.text:
If BVM is not effective perform the following:
Reposition Airway
Check correct mask size
Place
OPA
Check for gastric distention

No_2.text:
Place endotracheal tube or supraglottic airway
Assess:
ETCO2 Reading
Misting in tube
Equal breath sounds
Direct visualization of the cords if ETT used.
Monitor and transport
Check airway device
Tube dislodged?
Tube obstructed?
Pneumothorax?
Equipment failure?
Contact online medical control for further instructions
